derivation: constructive feminine of H1086 (בָּלָה) (equivalent to H1097 (בְּלִי));
outline:
1. not, except
  2. not
  3. except (after preceding negation)
  4. except (after an implied or expressed negation)
  5. so as not, in order not
  6. an account of not, because...not
  7. until not
kjv_def: because un(satiable), beside, but, [phrase] continual, except, from, lest, neither, no more, none, not, nothing, save, that no, without.
strongs_def: properly, a failure of, i.e. (used only as a negative particle, usually with a prepositional prefix) not, except, without, unless, besides, because not, until, etc.
